name: Brave point kill
description:
game introduction
"The Brave Point Kill" is an adventure game for the brave point kill. The game has well-designed monsters, the protagonist's heroic skills, and the entourage recruited who are willing to fight with you. Most of the levels in the game require the player to click, the faster you click, the faster the boss will die.

Game Features

⚪The combat system of "Point Kill" is a point kill game. Tap the screen to attack the enemy. The faster the tap, the higher the attack frequency. Killing monsters will be rewarded with gold coins.

⚪ The skill system is a major feature, in order to allow players to improve their skills and gain more powerful offensive capabilities in addition to improving their point kills.

⚪ The follower function is also a powerful function. It requires more coins, but the rewards are also good. The followers have powerful attack capabilities and can be upgraded and cultivated.
